examples: The air was frosty ; I could see my breath and walked quickly with my hands in my pockets.

definitions.definition: Having frost on it or in it.
examples: The frosty pumpkin is the sign of the end of the growing season, soon the greenery will wither and harvest end for the year.
The frosty beverage gave him a brain freeze.

definitions.definition: Having an aloof or inhospitable manner.
examples: After the divorce, she was civil but frosty to her ex.

secondary_definitions: Having frost on it or in it.
( figuratively ) Having an aloof or inhospitable manner.
